attributes.action: Want a National enquiry into grooming gangs in the uk
attributes.additional_details: The jay enquiry was a widespread investigation into child abuse and not specifically about possible widespread grooming gangs and the various parties who instigated a cover up!
attributes.background: To set up a national enquiry

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
